item.title: Lamp post not working, 4th August
item.description:
I am writing to report that the street lamp not working again. This issue was previously reported .The area is very dark at night, which raises safety concerns for pedestrians and residents.please arrange for the lamp post to be inspected and repaired as soon as possible? Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eversley Avenue, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Junction of Montague Place with Russell Square, 4th August
item.description:
Please could we have another set of No entry - Except cycles (and possibly the reverse) on the empty pole on the other side of the junction here please ? In the past week I have seen two vehicles driving the wrong way down Montague Place here (one of which has been reported to the Met Police).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montague Place, Bloomsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cycle stand on post near junction with Gower Street, 4th August
item.description:
The cycle stand which is a loop attached to a pole is facing into the pavement - it should be turned 90 degrees to be alongside the road, so that bikes parked here do not go "into" the pavement and obstruct it. Thanks

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Bollards acting as a road hazard, 4th August
item.description:
I have reported this issue before. The bollards are very hard to see especially at night an in the evening. Drivers regularly crash into them/ run them right over because they are black and minimally reflective. They should be brightly coloured and much taller. Yesterday a man (see photo) damaged his car after crashing into them. I just happened to see this one happen in the moment the lower right hand side of his front bumper was forced upwards and snapped vertically. He spent some time trying to align the two broken pieces before driving off again. Licence plate is BD22 RVX. This is not the first vehicle to get damaged from hitting these hard to see bollards but the attached photo is the only one i managed to get a photo of.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lisson Grove, St. John's Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public rubbish bin blocking the path, 4th August

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Well Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Hideous inappropriate signage, 4th August
item.description:
Huge new signs have appeared disfiguring conservation area. How could the council have thought these appropriate? Too high for drivers to read and ridiculous amount of information on them about a play street. A lot of people in neighbourhood complaining.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Northumberland Place, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet
